content.text: Match ends, Everton 1, Real Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, Everton 1, Real Madrid 2.
Attempt blocked. Denis Cheryshev (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kaká.
Attempt missed. Fábio Coentrão (Real Madrid) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Steven Naismith (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Denis Cheryshev replaces Mesut Özil.
Substitution, Everton. Bryan Oviedo replaces Leighton Baines.
Substitution, Everton. John Stones replaces Seamus Coleman.
Substitution, Everton. Gerard Deulofeu replaces Kevin Mirallas.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Sami Khedira.
Offside, Everton. Leighton Baines tries a through ball, but Nikica Jelavic is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Jesé (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kaká.
Attempt missed. Phil Jagielka (Everton) right footed shot from very close range is just a bit too high. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner from a direct free kick.
Hand ball by Pepe (Real Madrid).
Attempt missed. Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Mesut Özil.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Kaká replaces Karim Benzema.
Foul by Nikica Jelavic (Everton).
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Everton. Darron Gibson replaces John Heitinga.
Substitution, Everton. Ross Barkley replaces Marouane Fellaini.
Attempt saved. Jesé (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fábio Coentrão.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Seamus Coleman.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Sylvain Distin (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Goal!  Everton 1, Real Madrid 2. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Steven Naismith with a headed pass.
Foul by Leon Osman (Everton).
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Jesé replaces Cristiano Ronaldo.
Attempt saved. Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Cristiano Ronaldo.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Fábio Coentrão.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Nacho.
Offside, Real Madrid. Ángel Di María tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Seamus Coleman.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Attempt blocked. Nacho (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Seamus Coleman.
Offside, Real Madrid. Casemiro tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Casemiro.
Foul by Nikica Jelavic (Everton).
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half begins Everton 0, Real Madrid 2.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Diego López replaces Iker Casillas.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Ángel Di María replaces Isco.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Nacho replaces Sergio Ramos.
Substitution, Everton. Nikica Jelavic replaces Arouna Koné.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Casemiro replaces Luka Modric.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Fábio Coentrão replaces Marcelo.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Daniel Carvajal replaces Álvaro Arbeloa.
First Half ends, Everton 0, Real Madrid 2.
